name: Vintage Squeaky Toy Lamb
description:
Mary had a little lamb, shouldn't every child? This vintage squeaky toy would be a great present for a toddler or classic decor for a baby's nursery. The off white sheep has pink coloring on its face and ears as well as blue coloring on the front of its head. Much of the lamb's body is textured to give the appearance of wool. 

♥Size: H16cm, perfectly sized for a childlike companion
♥Material: Rubber

name: "Romeo & Julia" Magnetic Kissing Dolls
description:
MWAH MWAH! 

Place them close together to make them lean and kiss!
This adorable pair of little dolls lean in to kiss when placed close to each other. Based on a traditional Dutch curiosity, this is a very cute gift indeed.

Dimensions: 8cm high

name: USABURO x MIFFY KOKESHI - Snowy Day (Limited Version)
description:
USABURO MIFFY KOKESHI
USABURO KOKESHI is crafted using Japanese traditional techniques from 1950 by natural wood from chestnut and zelkova trees, from the northern part of Gunma, 150 kilometers north of Tokyo.

Size: H13.5cm, W5.8cm
Material: Chestnut wood and Zelkova wood
100% Handmade in JAPAN

*MIFFY KOKESHI is exclusive in Japan market and Fanci Home+Kids.

name: USABURO x MIFFY KOKESHI - 55th Limited Version
description:
USABURO MIFFY KOKESHI
USABURO KOKESHI is crafted using Japanese traditional techniques from 1950 by natural wood from chestnut and zelkova trees, from the northern part of Gunma, 150 kilometers north of Tokyo.

Size: H13.5cm, W5.8cm
Material: Chestnut wood and Zelkova wood
100% Handmade in JAPAN

*MIFFY KOKESHI is exclusive in Japan market and Fanci Home+Kids. 

★☆★☆　出貨注意　☆★☆★
第一批MIFFY KOKESHI - 55TH Limited Version太受歡迎馬上售完、現在缺貨中。第二批会在7月下旬到香港、但数量不多。為免客人想購買時再次缺貨、建議先下単、貨到後FANCI HOME+KIDS会馬上安排送貨。謝！

name: 【MORE TREES】Apple Kendama
description:
Designer Yasuhiro Suzuki changed the ball into an apple would be a great way for people to rediscover this often overlooked force of nature - gravity. Moreover, the more you play with it, the more the scratches make the ball look like a real apple. 

MADE IN JAPAN
Material: Cherry wood(body), Birch woof (Ball) and Cypress wood (stand).
Size: W65×D65×H190mm

Delivery Schedule:
Apple Kendama will be delivered with 3 weeks from Japan to HK after you placing an order.

~ About【MORE TREES】~
Tokyo based group 【MORE TREES】which aims to raise awareness of the current forest status in Japan. It founded in 2007 by Ryuichi Sakamoto and other 4 ppl, the group's main initiative is to promote smart wood consumption around the world and planting more trees. They aim to offset the CO2 emission as well as advance and stimulate the demand of tree thinning. 
Their products centered around the theme of the forest and nature.

name: Mustache Eye Glasses Holder - JEFF
description:
Mustache 每款眼鏡架都有自己的名字，有些是參考大眾普遍印象來取名，有些則是依照眼鏡的造型來聯想，彷彿真的有個人就是佩戴這款眼鏡!用來當作小禮物就最適合不過了！
Mr. Musta 材質為 EVA泡棉，需自行組裝材能使用。韓國製造。

♥Material : eva sponge
♥Size : 120x160x35mm
♥Design & Made : Korea

name: NEW!! Labrador Retriever Bookend
description:
人手雕製的拉布拉多犬樹脂書架，樣子迫真的拉布拉多犬，能為家中帶來一點生氣！不論作書架或是裝飾物，愛狗狗的你千萬不要錯過！

T what this adorable pair of Labrador Retriever bookends achieve. Perfect for vintage spaces, rustic homes and anyone who loves our doggie friends.

Size: W10cm x L15cm x H17cm
Weight: 1.6kg
Material: Resin

name: Thread Heart Home Decoration -Black/Pink/White
description:
樹脂製的仿毛線心型裝飾，每個人手雕製所以每一個都是獨一無二～
最適合用來點綴可愛的家居及用作送給至愛的小禮物♥

Shabby chic resin heart shaped decorations look like fairytale thread hearts, each one is slightly different and unique.
These little sweethearts will look pretty year round in your garden or home. They're great as wedding decorations and favors too!

Size: 15x 15 x 8 cm
Material: Resin

name: 【Egmont Toy】Mini Block Puzzle
description:
比利時Egmont toys社企劃的捷克製MINI BLOCK PUZZLE。
以天然木材製成，小小的四件小積木，可以砌出六幅可愛的圖畫。
復古風的畫風，比一般幼兒玩具更有味道，大人們把它當作家居擺設也很適合！

Wooden picture miniblocks for the smallest children in a 2x2pcs format.

Cube size: 3.7cm each
Weight: 130 g
Packed in paper box. 
Approved by CE.

MADE IN CZECH REPUBLIC

name: Retro Heads And Tails Cards Game
description:
Retro heads and tails card game fun for one or more players.
Heads and tails is the ideal family card game suitable for all ages.
The box contains 48 cards which form 24 complete pictures.
These can then be swapped around to make 576 different pictures.

Gorgeous illustations. Retro children's game! Every child will love it!!!

Size: 13 cm x 9 cm

name: Light Up Your Mood Light Switch Stickers - Boy/Girl
description:
Light Up Your Mood light switch stickers, designed by Henrietta Swift. Sets of stickers to turn all those dull and boring light switches into funny faces.

♥ 2 different sets: boys, girls or animal faces
♥ easy to peel of vinyl stickers, will leave no messy marks and can be re-used
♥ each pack contains enough noses, eyes, hair, ears, hair clips, moustaches etc to decorate at least 8 light switches
♥ Product in UK

name: 【DUÜET】Nail Stickers Strawberry Sunrise
description:
FREE STANDARD LOCAL DELIVERY

DUÜET believes in cutting edge style and using quality materials for a perfect finish. D.I.Y. your nails with your favourite design for the day!

•• Original design in Melbourne Australia
•• 14 Strips & 1 Nail File included 
•• Lasts up to 10 days 
•• ZERO drying time, ZERO nail polish smell 
•• Easy to use and remove

name: 【Pebble】ONCE UPON A TIME HUMPTY DUMPTY
description:
Once Upon a Time hunpty dumpty from the Pebble collection.

Fair Trade handmade crochet toy in the shape of humpty dumpty, featuring a bright multicoloured exterior, embroidered features and moveable limbs. Each 'Once Upon a Time...' character comes with a mini storybook designed to encourage play and development. 

Size: H40cm, W13cm
Material: 100% Cotton
Filling: 100% Polyester 
Care: Machine washable 
Made in Bangladesh

About Pepple:
Pepple is the best in hand manufacturing from community businesses in Bangladesh. Helping women out of property and putting smiles on faces worldwide!

name: 【Pebble】ONCE UPON A TIME CROCHET NUTCRACKER SOLDIER
description:
Once Upon a Time crochet Nutcracker soldier from the Pebble collection.

Handmade crochet toy in the shape of a Nutcracker soldier, featuring a bright multicoloured exterior, embroidered features and moveable limbs. Each 'Once Upon a Time...' character comes with a mini storybook designed to encourage play and development. 

Size: H32cm, W13cm
Material: 100% Cotton
Filling: 100% Polyester 
Care: Machine washable 
Made in Bangladesh

About Pepple:
Pepple is the best in hand manufacturing from community businesses in Bangladesh. Helping women out of property and putting smiles on faces worldwide!

name: 【Pebble】Knitted 'Flips' floppy bears - Freddie (Blue Pants)
description:
Fair Trade handmade knitted 'floppy' and 'flat' bears are called Freddie who wears red trousers, Harry who wears blue trousers and cute little Nancy who wears Pink trousers.  A great little friend for toddlers to carry around with them. Cute, quirky and ethically made!

Size: H23cm
Material: 100% Cotton
Filling: 100% Polyester 
Care: Machine washable 
Made in Bangladesh

About Pepple:
Pepple is the best in hand manufacturing from community businesses in Bangladesh. Helping women out of property and putting smiles on faces worldwide!

name: 【Pebble】Crochet Girl & Boy Large Bunnies
description:
Fair Trade handmade crochet toy in the shape of bunny.
These gorgeous crochet bunny dolls are ever so popular and it's easy to see why!  Together they look like they're the best of friends.  Separately they'll be a child's best friend!  The boy bunny has a bright red top on with a white star in the middle and the girl bunny has a turquoise dress with red and yellow detail.

Size: H37cm
Material: 100% Cotton
Filling: 100% Polyester 
Care: Machine washable 
Made in Bangladesh

About Pepple:
Pepple is the best in hand manufacturing from community businesses in Bangladesh. Helping women out of property and putting smiles on faces worldwide!

name: Handmade POLEPOLE animal Figure - Pig
description:
由白色的無垢木材彫出各種動物的POLEPOLE系列。

POLEPOLE在印度尼西亞語言的意思是“慢慢來”。
在印尼的BALI島，有大量的工匠要完成的最自然又沒有塗裝的動物，他們全是逐件逐件手工打磨，手工精緻。
從外觀到質感都能給人溫暖自然的感覺！
＊因為全人手製作， 每件貨品都可能有些不同。

Size: 約4.4cm×3cm×H6.2cm
Material: 無垢木材

name: 【Sense of Wonder】Organic Lamb Rattle
description:
來自日本有機品牌【Sense of Wonder】，對嬰幼兒幼嫩的肌膚絕對不會做成刺激的100﹪有機純綿製造小羊搖鈴布偶！
輕輕搖動布偶，在尾部內藏的搖鈴便會發出優雅的聲音。
最適合作為初生嬰兒的小禮物，讓這可愛的小羊陪伴寶寶成長：）
對於喜愛小羊擺設的大人們，把它用作家居擺設都很不錯喔。

Size: H25cm
Material: 100% Organic Cotton
Design in Japan

name: Joyeux Cosmetic Bag OR/RD/TQ
description:
出品自南印度職人的手工藝品，每個小包包都運用不用的材質組合出漂亮的圖案！最適合用作化粧袋及用來裝小物！
一共有三種顏色可選：
橙色（裡面配紫紅色）／紅色（裡面配橙色）／藍綠色（裡面配紅色）

This is a small sized zippered pouch, good for cosmetics, accessories, small art supplies, etc. 

Size：L15cm x H11.5cm
Material: 100% Cotton
Color: Orange/Red/Turquoise
Made in South India

name: Coq case L size/S size
description:
來自日本的白色陶磁製的公雞型小物收納盒，手工精細，可以用作放小飾物， 又或者放在玄關放碎錢及鎖匙，又或是只放在家中作家居擺設都很適合！
有大細兩款可選。

This ceramic rooster case is a wonderful addition to your sweet home. Store your little things in this case and away from sight. 

L size: W145×D104×H107
S size: W93×D71×H71
Color: White
Material: Ceramic

name: 【anzu to sumomo】Wooden Puzzel - Ann & Sue
description:
由兩塊木塊組成的手製小型砌圖，即使是年幻的小孩都可以樂於其中！
除了可以當是兒童的知育玩具，當作是家居擺設及送禮的小禮物都很適合呢～
有兩款可選： 「Town Musicians of Bremen（動物樂團）」和「ANN ﹠ SUE」。

【anzu to sumomo】
是由住在福島県的木製擺設設計師 斉藤麻美小姐品牌其下的室內擺設系列。
【anzu to sumomo】的製品是利用天然櫻花木和橡樹製造。

Packing Size :
Town Musicians of Bremen W67xD23xH140mm
Ann & Sue W95xD23xH110mm

name: Door Hanger Panda
description:
來自日本【AFTERNOON TEA】的熊貓掛門裝飾。熊貓的雙手內的磁鐵，可以讓熊貓掛在你喜歡的地方～ 如掛在孩子們的床頭，他們一定十分歡喜！

SIZE：W70mm×L350mm
MATERIAL:Polyester/Cotton/Magnet

name: Little Master Carroll alice in wonderland
description:
With the perennial popularity of classic writers like Charlotte Brontë and Lewis Carroll, Baby Lit is a fashionable way to introduce your toddler to the world of classic literature. With clever, simple text by Jennifer Adams, paired with stylish design and illustrations by Sugar's Alison Oliver, Little Miss Brontë and Little Master Carroll are a must for every savvy parent's nursery library.

Jennifer Adams is the author of a dozen books including Remarkably Jane: Notable Quotations on Jane Austen and the popular Y Is for Yorick: A Slightly Irreverent ABC Book for Grown-Ups. Jennifer works as a writer and editor in Salt Lake City.

Alison Oliver runs Sugar design studio. Alison's design portfolio includes everything from logos to packaging and product design for clients such as Chronicle Books, Citibabes, Aerie, as well as Gibbs Smith. She lives in Manhattan.

Reading level: Ages 1 and up
Board book: 22 pages
Product Dimensions: 6.9 x 0.6 x 6.9 inches

name: Little Master Shakespeare
description:
Romeo & Juliet was chosen as one of Parents Magazine's top 20 children's books of 2011.

The perennial popularity of classic writers like Jane Austen and William Shakespeare, Baby Lit is a fashionable way to introduce your toddler to the world of classic literature. With clever, simple counting text by Jennifer Adams, paired with stylish design and illustrations by Sugar's Alison Oliver, Little Miss Austen and Little Master Shakespeare are a must for every savvy parent's nursery library.

Jennifer Adams is the author of a dozen books including Remarkably Jane: Notable Quotations on Jane Austen and the popular Y Is for Yorick: A Slightly Irreverent ABC Book for Grown-Ups. Jennifer works as a writer and editor in Salt Lake City. Her favorite baby name is Fitzwilliam.

Alison Oliver runs Sugar design studio. Alison's design portfolio includes everything from logos to packaging and product design for clients such as Chronicle Books, Citibabes, Aerie, as well as Gibbs Smith. She lives in Manhattan. Her favorite baby name is Lizzy.

Reading level: Ages 1 and up
Board book: 22 pages

Product Dimensions: 6.9 x 0.6 x 6.9 inches

name: Little Miss Austen
description:
With the perennial popularity of classic writers like Jane Austen and William Shakespeare, Baby Lit is a fashionable way to introduce your toddler to the world of classic literature. With clever, simple counting text by Jennifer Adams, paired with stylish design and illustrations by Sugar's Alison Oliver, Little Miss Austen and Little Master Shakespeare are a must for every savvy parent's nursery library.

Jennifer Adams is the author of a dozen books including Remarkably Jane: Notable Quotations on Jane Austen and the popular Y Is for Yorick: A Slightly Irreverent ABC Book for Grown-Ups. Jennifer works as a writer and editor in Salt Lake City. Her favorite baby name is Fitzwilliam.

Alison Oliver runs Sugar design studio. Alison's design portfolio includes everything from logos to packaging and product design for clients such as Chronicle Books, Citibabes, Aerie, as well as Gibbs Smith. She lives in Manhattan. Her favorite baby name is Lizzy.

Reading level: Ages 1 and up
Board book: 22 pages
Product Dimensions: 6.9 x 0.6 x 6.9 inches

name: Can You See What I See Memory Game
description:
Everyday objects get a whole new meaning or come to life by adding small sketches to them. This is the principle behind this new poetic and funny memory game. One card shows an everyday object and the matching card makes you look at the object in a totally different way because the artist added a little line or drawing. Your task, as ever, is to find the matching cards. 

About the Author
Tineke Meirink: Tineke works for several renowned publishers like Zwijssen and Wolters Noordhoff. Making beautiful illustrations for books, magazines and television.

Product Dimensions: 2.8 x 2.4 x 5.8 inches

name: Patrick Hruby Memory Game
description:
All ages will enjoy this timeless game featuring a selection of Patrick Hruby's bold and imaginative illustrations.

How to play:
 For younger children, play with nine pairs or fewer. For a more challenging game, geared toward older children and adults, play with all 36 pairs. Mix and spread cards face down. Players take turns flipping any two cards up. If cards match, play continues. If cards do not match, player's turn ends and cards remain in the same position. When all cards are matched, player with the most pairs wins.

Width: 190 mm
Height: 190 mm
Thickness: 29 mm

name: Pop-up House of Invention
description:
Would you believe that a scientist caught a cold and died while conducting experiments in early refrigeration? Did you know that soap was once made from goat fat? Can you guess how pumpernickel bread got its name? Did you know there is polytetrafl uoroethylene somewhere in your kitchen? It’s all true! It’s all amazing! And it’s all in the updated, reissued Robert Crowther’s Amazing Pop-up House of Inventions. Just step inside, open the cupboards, peek in the closets and drawers, and learn about hundreds of inventions you can fi nd right in your own home — including DVDs, MP3s, wireless headsets, and PDAs.

About Author
Robert Crowther is the creator Ships, Trains, and Flight as well as numerous other pop-up books, including COLORS, OPPOSITES, and SHAPES. He lives in Norfolk, England.

Number of pages: 12
Width: 218 mm
Height: 262 mm
Thickness: 23 mm

name: Animals! Matching Game
description:
這是每個家庭最喜歡的有趣和簡單的遊戲，能幫助孩子培養記憶力，注意力，並搭配技巧。另外，每個卡都有寫上動物的名稱，可以讓孩子認識26種不同的動物！

Sure to be a family favorite, this fun and easy game will help children develop memory, concentration, and matching skills. Plus each card also features a caption that teaches young players the names of 36 amazing animals!

Width: 226 mm
Height: 231 mm
Thickness: 38 mm

name: Around the World Puzzle
description:
可用作教育小孩有關不同國家及文化的知育砌圖。由有和插畫師Micah Player繪圖。

16雙面拼圖
產品材質：紙板，紙
完成砌圖尺寸：直徑30“

Teach your little ones about countries and cultures, with help from the offbeat illustrations of Micah Player.

About the Author
Micah Player is an illustrator living in Los Angeles. He brings his distinctive aesthetic to this out-of-this-world puzzle.

16 two-sided puzzle pieces
Material: Cardboard, paper
Completed puzzle: 30" diameter

name: Bu! Blankie
description:
來自瑞典的BU！BLANKIE，是由名設計師Will Broome設計，霊感是來自小孩最喜愛玩的PEEK﹣A﹣BOO遊戲，BU！BLANKIE除了是一張薄被外， 還可以和小寶貝玩PEEK-A-BOO，為親子之間大增樂趣！

＊如希望訂購己SOLD OUT的產品，請EMAIL給我們安排訂貨， 我們會盡快回覆您！ Email: order@fancihomekids.com

Special edition by Will Broome

Every child's best friend. Besides being a travelling friend the comforting blankie doubles as a peekabo sheet, and offers different levels of pedagogical and playful interaction depending on the child’s age – peekaboo games for the smaller children, character and role play for the toddlers. The holes are perfect for thumbsuckers too. (0-5 years)

Product description and measurement:
Ø 70 cm. 100% cotton. 
Base in sand color with navy or purple print. Several different colors of edges. Printed with non-toxic dyes.
Care instructions: Wash in machine 40°C.

About Will Broome
Will has made him self a name in the fashion industry through collaborations with a number of labels, such as Marc by Marc Jacobs, Gucci, Missoni and Topshop etc. So you understand we are happy when he showed excitement over this collaboration.

options.name: Pirate (Purple Print/Blue and Yellow Edges)- SOLD OUT
Lion (Yellow Print/Yellow and Grey Edges)- SOLD OUT

name: 【Jun Collection】Animal Display Polar Bear Set
description:
來自日本JUN COLLECTION的北極熊套裝！內含浮冰兩塊，北極熊兩隻，企鵝2隻！這是最適合用來增加小孩子想像力及溝通技巧的知育玩具！而且手工精美放在玄關位置裝飾， 更可令家居變得更可愛～
以禮物盒包裝，用作送禮都十分適合！

Display Box Size: 15cm×15cm

name: 【Jun Collection】Animal Display Autumn Forest Set
description:
來自日本JUN COLLECTION的秋天森林動物套裝！內含3棵樹木，小熊兩隻，松鼠一隻，木板台一塊！這是最適合用來增加小孩子想像力及溝通技巧的知育玩具！而且手工精美放在玄關位置裝飾， 更可令家居變得更可愛～
以禮物盒包裝，用作送禮都十分適合！

Display Box Size: 15cm×15cm

【岀貨日期】
第一批因大受歡迎而馬上售完。第二批現在正準備由日本運送到港，並將於4月下旬到貨。現在訂購的客戶，將會於4月底陸續寄出各下之訂單，請注意。

name: 【Jun Collection】Happy Friend Polar Bear Set
description:
來自日本JUN COLLECTION最新創作冰之親子世界組合！北極熊，企鵝，海獅母子每天都在冰天雪地裡玩！這是最適合用來增加小孩子想像力及溝通技巧的知育玩具！
而且手工精美放在玄關位置裝飾， 更可令家居變得更可愛～

■每套包括
・海獅（大／小）
・北極熊（大／小）
・企鵝 （大／小）
・冰山
・木製圓形台

サイズ： φ150×H70 mm

name: 【Jun Collection】Happy Friend Marin Set
description:
來自日本JUN COLLECTION最新創作的海洋組合！海鷗在空中飛，海豚及鯨魚在海洋裡暢泳！這是最適合用來增加小孩子想像力及溝通技巧的知育玩具！
而且手工精美放在玄關位置裝飾， 更可令家居變得更可愛～

■每套包括
・入道雲
・鯨魚（大／小）
・海豚
・波浪4個
・海鷗
・木製圓形台

Size： φ150×H155 mm

name: 【Jun Collection】Happy Friend Dogs Set
description:
來自日本JUN COLLECTION最新創作的森林中的紅色小屋！紅色小屋裡住了2隻小狗及2隻小猫，它們最喜歡在紅色小屋裡玩耍！
這是最適合用來增加小孩子想像力及溝通技巧的知育玩具！
而且手工精美放在玄關位置裝飾， 更可令家居變得更可愛～

■每套包括
・狗屋
・樹木２棵（大・小深緑）
・小狗２隻
・小猫２隻
・松樹２棵（大・小黄緑）
・木製圓形台

Size： φ150×H75 mm

name: 【Jun Collection】Animal Wooden Puzzel
description:
來自日本JUN COLLECTION的原木森林動物砌圖。
每套包含13塊砌圖， 是4款不同種類的森林動物。喜愛森林動物的小朋友一定不能錯過！充滿難度的砌圖，即使是大人都想一起接受挑戰！

Size: W205×H150×D18 mm

每套内容
Ａ小猫 5塊
Ｂ小狗 3塊
Ｃ小兔 2塊
Ｄ松鼠 3塊

name: 【Jun Collection】Dinosaur Wooden Puzzel
description:
來自日本JUN COLLECTION的原木恐龍砌圖。
每套包含10塊砌圖， 是10款不同種類的恐龍。喜愛恐龍的小朋友一定不能錯過！充滿難度的砌圖，即使是大人都想一起接受挑戰！

Size: W15×H2×D15cm mm

name: 【Jun Collection】Animal Car - Mouse/Cat/Clown
description:
來自日本JUN COLLECTION的木製動物手推車，用手輕輕一推，載著小動物的木頭車便會向前走～很可愛喔！
不論是車輪抑或是軸， 都是用原木造成，手工十分細緻☆
即使放在家中裝飾都很適合！
一共有3款可選：小老鼠／小貓／小丑

SIZE：W85×H70×D47

name: Felt Felt Hamburger
description:
♪每個小朋友都喜歡玩的過家家遊戲♪
來自日本教育玩具大師JUN COLLECTION設計，它是由羊毛氈製成的特大漢堡包，質地柔軟又蓬鬆，可以讓小寶寶安全地玩耍！
中間的材料可以取出讓小孩隨意配搭，不但可以訓練小孩的創作能力，也可大大提升社交能力喔！

Size: Ф85mm×H100mm
Material: Felt(Polyester)

name: Girl Wooden Stamp (Very Good/OK/I Love you/Hello)
description:
四款穿著可愛波點連身裙的小女孩木製印章。小女孩手上氣球的字就是印章上刻有的字。

不論在信件或明信片，或想製作環保袋或手帕時，蓋上小印章便馬上令平平無奇的小物變成屬於自己風格的創作品！
而且這還是一個很可愛的室內裝飾品呢。

«產品尺寸» 高5cm

name: Lindo Animal Cushion-Lamb/Camel Rabbit/Ribbon Rabbit
description:
日本直接進口，非常逼真的動物靠墊。尺寸大小適中，放在椅背上或梳化上都很適合。
有可愛的小綿羊, 小兔可選。

SIZE：W31×H34cm
MATERIAL：Polyester

name: Bird Stand LED Light
description:
來自日本的BIRD STAND LED LIGHT！
大咀鳥的模樣十分可愛， LED燈就在大咀鳥的咀內！
設有兩個階段可以調教。
有黒色及白色可選。

SIZE：12x8xH22cm
MATERIAL：ABS／PS
【注意事項】
単三形乾電池3本使用

name: Liberty Print Rabbit
description:
來自英國【JELLYCAT】最受歡迎的毛絨兔子玩偶、今次特別和日本【AFTERNOON TEA】合作，害羞的小兔子（S）的耳朵及腳底特別縫上可愛的碎花布，是JELLYCAT X AFTERNOON TEA的日本限定商品！垂下的耳朵和粉紅色的小鼻，令您愛不釋手♥
有白色和灰色可選。

Liberty Print is one Jellycat bunny who stands out from the crowd, with her bold floral paw pads and floppy long ears. Twitching a suede-feel pink nose, we especially love Blossom's fluffy white tail and squidgy soft bottom, which is packed with beans to help her sit up.

Size: H18cm
Material: Polyester
Suitable for all ages 
Hand wash

name: Elegant Café Pot （Bird/Rabbit/Ribbon/Rose)
description:
超級可愛小蛋糕形狀的小收納盒。
最適合放在家中點綴家居！
有小鳥（白色），小兔（綠色），蝴蝶結（粉紅色），玫瑰（紫色）可選。

Size:Φ8.5×9cm
Material: Ceramic

name: Cupcake Canister  (Blue/Pink/Purple)
description:
超級可愛小蛋糕形狀的小收納盒。
最適合放在家中點綴家居！
有藍色，粉紅色，紫色可選。

Size:約φ8×H9cm
Material: Ceramic

name: Caramel Popcorn Maker
description:
超推薦商品！ ！ ！
只要把爆米花在微波爐中，同時間可以烹調你喜愛的醬料，好好享受合付自己口味的爆米花！

生産地：日本/新潟
Package Size: 131x157x156mm
Material: Polypropylene / polystyrene / nylon
Made in Japan

name: Geese Measuring Set
description:
鵝子家庭的量杯和湯匙套裝。實在太可愛了！
量杯的大小是1/4杯，1/3杯，1/2杯，1杯，湯匙的大小是15毫升，7.5毫升，2.5毫升，1.25毫升，他們都標記在底部。
鵝子尾部的特別設計是為方便傾倒，而脖子可用作為手柄。

Goose Family Measuring Cups & Spoons in Plastic. Adorable and so kitsch!
Cup sizes are 1/4 cup, 1/3 cup, 1/2 cup, & 1 cup; Spoon sizes are 15ml, 7.5ml, 2.5ml, 1.25ml; and they are all marked individually on bottom.
The tail comes to a point for easy pouring and the neck/face is your handle.

Material: Cup/PS; Spoon/PP

name: Bubble Gelato
description:
是小朋友最喜愛的GELATO形狀的吹泡泡～
打開GELATO的部分就可以拿出棒棒出來吹泡泡！
每款泡泡充滿糖果的氣味。很吸引～
玩完後放在家中作裝飾都很可愛呀～

SIZE：W15cm×H2.3cm×D2.3cm／120ml
MATERIAL：Plastic

name: SCRIBBLES Animal Puzzel Stamp
description:
來自日本的可愛的動物和數字模樣的砌圖圖章。每個字母都是由一種動物來表示圖案的數量都是跟據圖章的數字來繪製。
材料使用的是柔軟及有彈性的EVA，不但對環境不會做成負担，也可安心的享讓小朋友使用。
那清新可愛的模樣，不僅是小朋友，即使是大人都會馬上愛上它！
SCRIBBLERS PUZZEL STAMP的設計師建讓把字母和數字印在紙上，然後一個一個剪出來放在框架上，可以讓小朋友隨時隨地學習字母和數字，大家都不妨一試！

Size: W300×D220×H12 mm 
Marterial: EVA ・ Rubber

name: SCRIBBLERS Number Puzzel Stamp
description:
來自日本的可愛的動物和數字模樣的砌圖圖章。每個圖案的數量都是跟據圖章的數字來繪製。
材料使用的是柔軟及有彈性的EVA，不但對環境不會做成負担，也可安心的享讓小朋友使用。
那清新可愛的模樣，不僅是小朋友，即使是大人都會馬上愛上它！
SCRIBBLERS PUZZEL STAMP的設計師喜歡把字母和數字印在紙上，然後一個一個剪出來放在框架上，放在家中裝飾，大家都不妨一試！

Size: W230×D146×H12 mm 
Marterial: EVA ・ Rubber

name: Kids Circus Tent - Fun Fun
description:
由日本直接進口，最受小孩子歡迎的馬戲團帳幕登埸！
自然風的房間或是可愛風的房間都很適合！不論是展開抑或是收納時都很方便易用！摺合後的尺寸只有直徑40厘米，方便收藏～

【注意事項】
・対象年齢３歲以上。
・請陪同你的小孩一起玩耍。
・只適合室內使用。

Size：(Setup)Ф1100×H1500mm; (Folded) Ф400mm
Material: (Bag)Polyester; (Frame) Steel; (Pole) Glass Fibre, Steel

name: Kids Castle Tent - Mon Jardin
description:
由日本直接進口，最受小孩子歡迎的城堡帳幕登埸！
MON JARDIN在法文裡是“我的花園”的意思，自然風的房間或是可愛風的房間都很適合！不論是展開抑或是收納時都很方便易用！摺合後的尺寸只有直徑40厘米，方便收藏～

【注意事項】
・対象年齢３歲以上。
・請陪同你的小孩一起玩耍。
・只適合室內使用。

【岀貨日期】
第三批因大受歡迎而已馬上售完。如欲訂購請email聯絡我們：order@fancihomekids.com
我們會向日本再次訂貨。

Size：(Setup)Ф1100×H1500mm; (Folded) Ф400mm
Material: (Bag)Polyester; (Frame) Steel; (Pole) Glass Fibre, Steel

name: Wind-up Animal (10sytles)
description:
日本進口的上鍊小動物☆
為每款動物上鍊後， 它們便會一步一步向前步行～
看到樣子可愛的小動物， 雖然是單純的動作， 但已足夠令你笑顏滿開～
※対象年齢6歲以上

Size: W4×D3.5×H7cm
Material: PVC

★謝謝大家對Wind-up animals 的喜愛，"OWL(white)"已售完。下批貨到港時會再作通知。
如若希望預訂＂OWL(white)", 請email到order@fancikidshome.com, 我們會馬上聯絡您♡

name: Art Cards for Baby-Sea
description:
來自美國的Wee Gallery的Art Card利用大膽，異想天開的圖像設計和手繪的風格，來為增強初生嬰兒視覺神經。Wee Gallery以黑色和白色的圖像和重複的圖案來吸引着小寶寶。可以把Art Card放在摇籃裏或是貼在寶寶房牆上，為小寶寶創造一個小畫廊；亦可以對月齡較大的寶寶用作Flash Card.

Sea Series每套包括黃貂魚，章魚，水母，海馬，海龜和魚。堅硬的厚紙印制，可以垂直放在平面上讓寶寶探索。而且每張卡都漂亮地作了磨砂保護加工和圓角設計，細心地保護小寶寶雙手。每張卡的尺寸為5“X7”。

物料：有機大豆油墨印刷，100﹪再造紙

建議：0-12個月
安全性：本產品符合或超過ASTM（美國標準），BSI（歐洲標準）所規定的安全規格。

Gallery art cards are created from bold, whimsical, hand-painted originals that cater to a baby's visual strengths. The black and white images and their repeating patterns captivate little ones. Place them in the crib to transform it into a wee gallery or use them as flash cards for older children. 

A boxed set includes a stingray, octopus, jellyfish, sea horse, turtle and fish. Printed on sturdy board, these cards will stand up to baby's explorations. Each 5"x7" card beautifully finished with matte lamination and child-friendly rounded corners.

Size: 5"x7" 
Material: Printed with soy ink on 100% recycled card stock

Recommendations: 0-12 months
Safety: This product meets or exceeds safety specifications set forth by ASTM International (American standard) and the BSI (European standard).

name: Art Cards for Baby-Garden
description:
來自美國的Wee Gallery的Art Card利用大膽，異想天開的圖像設計和手繪的風格，來為增強初生嬰兒視覺神經。Wee Gallery以黑色和白色的圖像和重複的圖案來吸引着小寶寶。可以把Art Card放在摇籃裏或是貼在寶寶房牆上，為小寶寶創造一個小畫廊；亦可以對月齡較大的寶寶用作Flash Card.

Garden Series每套包括松鼠，蝴蝶，蜻蜓，甲蟲，鳥和蠕虫。堅硬的厚紙印制，可以垂直放在平面上讓寶寶探索。而且每張卡都漂亮地作了磨砂保護加工和圓角設計，細心地保護小寶寶雙手。每張卡的尺寸為5“X7”。

物料：有機大豆油墨印刷，100﹪再造紙

建議：0-12個月
安全性：本產品符合或超過ASTM（美國標準），BSI（歐洲標準）所規定的安全規格。

Wee Gallery art cards are created from bold, whimsical, hand-painted originals that cater to a baby's visual strengths. The black and white images and their repeating patterns captivate little ones. Place them in the crib to transform it into a wee gallery or use them as flash cards for older children. 

A boxed set includes a squirrel, butterfly, dragonfly, ladybug, bird and worm. Printed on sturdy board, these cards will stand up to baby's explorations. Each 5"x7" card beautifully finished with matte lamination and child-friendly rounded corners.

Size: 5"x7" 
Material: Printed with soy ink on 100% recycled card stock

Recommendations: 0-12 months
Safety: This product meets or exceeds safety specifications set forth by ASTM International (American standard) and the BSI (European standard).

name: 32 Ways to Dress an Animal - 32 page Activity Book
description:
不論用塗鸦或油漆，拼貼或標記，讓小隊盡情爆發创造力去装扮狐狸，兔子和猪！
这个小5x3.5英寸的小本是完全附合小手的尺寸，細少方便，最適合帶到餐聽或汽車旅行， 為小朋友解解悶悶～

Use scribbles or paint, collage or markers to find creative ways to dress up the fox, the rabbit and the pig! This little 5x3.5 inch book is perfectly sized for little hands, and can be easily packed for restaurant or car trips. 

Size: L12.5cm x W8.75cm, 32pages
Material: Recycled paper, Soy inks
Printed in USA

name: Wee Gallery Russian Nesting Dolls (全球限量300套）
description:
這一套三個俄羅斯娃娃，它們包括了獅子，猫和猫頭鷹。
它們附有一個白毛絨布袋，可以保護此珍貴的俄羅斯娃娃。
它們是俄羅斯職人全人手製作，全球只有300套的限量商品。
十分珍貴，很藉得收藏！
用作家居擺設及送禮用品，都非常適合。

This set of 3 Nesting Dolls are made in Russia and include the Lion, the Cat and the Owl. The three come packaged one inside the other and all safely tucked away in a white felt bag with black tie. This is a specialty item with limited availability. 

Size: 
(Lion) H10.6cm, (Cat) H7.5cm, (Owl) H5.0cm.

Small Parts Warning: The owl is small enough to require a small parts warning. This item is rated for 3+. It is not a toy for babies or toddlers. Please keep out of reach of children below 3.

name: Wee Gallery Handmade Seahorse（under fair trade conditions）
description:
Wee Gallery 的 海馬布偶是利用三種高對比度的印花布製造，目的是刺激新生兒的視覺細胞，而柔軟的純綿布就是提示要給它多點擁抱～
他的尾巴可以掛在婴兒床或婴先車上，可便收裝。
眼睛是用刺繡方式繨上，可以安心安全地讓新生兒玩耍。
＊符合美国和欧洲玩具标准。
＊南印度製造（公平交易產品）
＊可以放進洗衣機清洗及自然吹乾

The Wee Seahorse is made with a trio of high-contrast printed fabrics to attract babies' eyes and soft cotton means lots of cuddling. Hang from his tail in the crib or stroller. The eyes are embroidered so no danger of pulling off. Complies with US and European toys standards.

Materials: 100% cotton fabric with polyester filling
Made in: South India under fair trade conditions
Care: Machine Wash cold, air dry

name: Milk Bottle Aroma by 中川政七商店
description:
來自日本的【中川政七商店】的牛奶瓶消臭芳香剤。
充滿舒服溫柔的天竺葵香氣或櫻花香氣的牛奶瓶消臭芳香剤。
作為小禮物也很適合！
香氣可維持1個半月至兩個月。（視乎使用狀況）

Size: Dia5.5cm×H15cm
Material: Glass, Paper (Cap of bottle)
Scent: Geranium天竺葵／ Cherry Blossom櫻花

name: MUGTAIL Bear
description:
屬於大人童話氣味的精簡設計。來自日【KINTO】的MUGtail ，小熊子尾巴馬克杯。
「在森林裡的小熊，跑進杯子裡了，露出羽絨狀的尾巴，小熊撞倒頭，忽然爬了起來......」（杯子的故事）

大人也有童心，也喜歡幽默的設計，
MUG tail 的尾巴部位，剛剛好就是杯耳，可以拿起的地方。

磁器表現出動物毛毛的溫暖質感，不單止在日本，在歐美也很受歡迎！
雖然是馬克杯， 但是也可以用作蠟燭台， 柔和的燈光從動物的身影透出來， 讓房間籠罩在柔和的光線中。
 
Size：φ100×H85・W108mm/460ml
Materail：Ceramic
Microwave oven: OK

name: I Had A Favorite Dress
description:
Boni Ashburn創作的迷人故事， 由Julia Denos負責插圖。講述了一個小小的時尚達人，她最喜歡的裙子，以至她不能與它們分開。有一次，她媽媽縫製以下後，把裙子轉換成一件襯衫，然後是坦克，然後一條短裙，真的難以至信！

Boni Ashburn's charming story, sweetly illustrated by Julia Denos, tells of a young fashion plate who loves her favorite dress so much that she just can't part with it. A few snip-snip-sew-sews later, and her mother transforms it into a shirt, then a tank, then a skirt, and you won't believe what else! 

Format: Hardback
Number of pages: 32
Width: 216 mm
Height: 267 mm
Thickness: 12 mm
Weight: 440 g

name: Alexander Girard Color Board Book
description:
來自有名的插圖大師Alexander Girard色彩艷麗的紙板書。

ALEXANDER GIRARD COLOR紙板書的出版是慶祝插圖大師Alexander Girard為20世紀帶來既生動的，好玩的，又複雜的世界。

封面是1972年創作的“女孩”，以及內頁是一共26個經典Alexander Girard設計。喜愛Alexander Girard的，ALEXANDER GIRARD COLOR紙板書必是珍藏之一。

對於學前兒童，此書可以讓兒童學習識別顏色，更能讓他們享受這個迷人的小書和它的異想天開的插圖。

Colorful and cheerful board book for kids and grown-ups. 

The ALEXANDER GIRARD COLOR board book celebrates the vivid, playful, and sophisticated world of 20th century design icon Alexander Girard. ALEXANDER GIRARD COLOR features the vintage 1972 illustration “Girls” on the cover, as well as 26 classic Girard designs.

Pre-schoolers learning to identify colors will enjoy this charming little book and its whimsical illustrations. Design savvy adults will also love the vintage illustrations and sophisticated packaging design.

58 pages. 
Dimensions: 6 x 6 x 1.2 (in)

name: Alexander Girard Memory Game
description:
來自有名的插圖大師Alexander Girard名作的記憶遊戲卡. 

36對Alexander Girard的俏皮而精緻的紡織品設計和豐富多彩的插圖，適合各年齡段的兒童和成人樂在其中。Alexander Girard的經典設計為這個益智傳統的遊戲添上快樂的色彩。

玩法：
對於年幼的孩子，建議玩9對卡或以下。如果希望更具挑戰性或年齡較大的兒童和成人，就可以使用所有36對。先混合所有卡，然後把牌面朝下。玩家輪流翻轉任何兩張牌。如果卡片相同，玩家可繼續玩下去。如果卡不匹配，要讓另一個玩家玩，卡將保持在相同的位置。哪玩家匹配得最多卡，哪就是勝利者。

Thirty-six of Girard’s playful yet sophisticated textile designs and colorful illustrations are featured in this well-designed game for children of all ages and adults. Girard’s vintage, and now classic, designs are a delightful addition to our design-centric toys for kids.

How to play:
For younger children, play with nine pairs or fewer. For a more challenging game, geared toward older children and adults, play with all 36 pairs. Mix and spread cards face down. Players take turns flipping any two cards up. If cards match, player continues. If cards do not match, player’s turn ends and cards remain in the same position. When all cards are matched, player with the most pairs wins.

Dimensions: box, 7.5 x 7.5 x 1 (in) cards, 2.25 x 2.25 (in)

description:

name: Bridal Rabbits
description:
來自日本【AFTERNOON TEA】超人氣婚嫁系列之小兔結婚記念公仔！
用毛線編成，充滿溫暖感的小兔配偶，耳朵的內側特別縫上SATIN布材顯得特別高貴！小兔新娘戴上珍珠項錬而小兔新郎側配上白色煲呔，實在太可愛了！
不論是用作結婚記念，送給將要結婚的親友，又或是用來裝飾結婚汽車及場地，都很適合！！

Rabbit Size: W70mm×D100mm×H135mm
Package Size: W135mm×D110mm×H145mm
Material: Polyester, acrylic, ABS resin

name: Bridal Alpacas Set
description:
來自日本【AFTERNOON TEA】超人氣婚嫁系列之駝羊結婚記念公仔！
樣子可愛善良的駝羊配偶，粉紅色的駝羊新娘戴上珍珠項錬及皇冠， 白色的駝羊新郎側配上黑色煲呔，實在太可愛了！
不論是用作結婚記念，送給將要結婚的親友， 又或是用來裝飾結婚汽車及場地， 都很適合！！

【岀貨日期】
因大受歡迎而暫時缺貨。如欲訂購請email聯絡我們：order@fancihomekids.com
我們會向日本再次訂貨。訂購後大約3星期到港。

Alpaca Size: W60mm×D140mm×H190mm
Package: W140mm×D140mm×H200mm
Material:Polyester resins, ABS, acrylic, nylon

name: Fleur Rabbit Sachet
description:
來自日本【AFTERNOON TEA】的漂亮花柄小兔子香囊。適宜掛在房間，衣櫃或走廊，為你的家居散發淡淡的宜人香氣！
有2香味的玫瑰（粉紅色），薰衣草（紫色）。

This pretty floral sachet rabbit from Japanese brand "Afternoon Tea". It is a nice to hang in bedroom, wardrobe and corridor.  
Available in two scents Rose (pink), lavender (purple).

Size: W130mm×D40mm×H120mm
Length of Ribbon: 115mm
Package Size: W165mm×D35mm×H125mm
Material: Cotton, Polyester, Polyethylene, Perfume

name: Peanut crayon
description:
超可愛花生形的蠟筆配上花生形的盒子！
花生形的蠟筆很適合小孩子的手型，最適合送給孩子們作為隨身的作畫工具！
即使是放在桌面裝飾都很不錯阿！
蠟筆數量：6種不同顏色

It is a peanut-shaped crayon in peanut-shaped case.
Peanut-shaped is easily to hold, which perfect for young children to begin their very first drawing!
It is also suitable for desktop decoration.
Crayon color: 6

material：plastic, crayon
size：w12.3 × d6 × h4.3cm
